original_text: Now those who were with me saw the light but did not understand the voice of the one who was speaking to me.
korean_text: 나와 함께 있는 사람들이 빛은 보면서도 나에게 말씀하시는 이의 소리는 듣지 못하더라

sentences.original_text: Now those who were with me
but did not understand the voice
of the one who was speaking to me
